definition: to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: Much attention has been paid on the suitability and flexibility of the facility in tube distribution.
sentences.chinese: 在管網布局上突出了窯窖滴灌的靈活性與適應性。

sentences.english: Quality pit mud is one of the essential factors for quality Luzhou-flavor liquor production.
sentences.chinese: 優質的窖泥是生產高質量濃香型麴酒的基本條件之一。

sentences.english: This time the chicken fell into the mud pit and yelled to the horse to get help.
sentences.chinese: 這個時候雞陷入泥窖，並大聲喊來馬，以獲得幫助。

sentences.english: Nanya Ken industrial district, Daoyao town, Dongguan City.
sentences.chinese: 東莞市道窖鎮南丫坑龍工業區。

sentences.english: The characteristics of aged cellar mud was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了瀘州老窖老窖池的窖泥特性。

sentences.english: The thermal performance of the orange cellar with twin arching trenches is sYstematicallY studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文對連拱溝窖的熱功能進行了全面系統的研究。

sentences.english: Quality artificial pit mud instead of the aged pit mud.
sentences.chinese: 用人工優質窖泥更換老化窖泥。

sentences.english: Quality artificial pit mud instead of the aged pit mud.
sentences.chinese: 用人工優質窖泥更換老化窖泥。

sentences.english: Smaller pit rooms and pits were used for many different functions.
sentences.chinese: 小的窖房和坑用於多種不同的功能。

sentences.english: Its application in the culture of pit mud could also improve pit mud quality.
sentences.chinese: 應用於窖泥的培養，提高窖泥質量。

sentences.english: Its application in the culture of pit mud could also improve pit mud quality.
sentences.chinese: 應用於窖泥的培養，提高窖泥質量。

definition: jug (earthenware with a big belly and a small opening)
to seal jars etc with mud, clay or lute/lute/luting
a squat jar for holding wine, sauces etc
